类 BEScrollBarUI

  • java.lang.Object

          • org.jb2011.lnf.beautyeye.ch4_scroll.BEScrollBarUI
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class BEScrollBarUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicScrollBarUI
    本类是滚动条的UI实现.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Jack Jiang(jb2011@163.com), 2009-09-01

      protected class  BEScrollBarUI.WindowsArrowButton
      WindowsArrowButton is used for the buttons to position the document up/down.

        protected void paintThumbIfSoSmall(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,

                       int y,
